message.body: Let me know if you want to drop cooper at all tomorrow night! We'd love him to come play while you guys go out ;) although I'm sure you are anxious for y
our friends to meet him too. But even after dinner if you want to grab a drink he can come over and hang out with us. Just let me know!!!! He would be in
toy heaven even if my kids are in bed! Seriously, I don't have anything going on!
That ks for the offer. Probably take him tho. Maybe Christmas time we will do something like that though.
Friday night you guys around for dinner at mom and dad's? Or we can continue e up there.
Fri and Sat we are planning on spending with mom/dad you guys
I thought so but wanted to offer! We'd love to have him anytime!
I know it's hard on him too because he isn't totally comfortable with us :)
We are planning on coming up after work!
Us too! Love our time together
